settings.title: The Campaign:
settings.copy: Introducing the #SaveThePenguinChallenge! Join us in a global movement to combat climate change with our exclusive AR filter on TikTok and Instagram. By participating, you help raise funds directly supporting penguin conservation efforts and the fight against climate change.

settings.title: Your Impact:
settings.copy: Every video posted using our AR filter contributes directly to our fundraising goals. All proceeds go to environmental organizations working to protect penguins and their habitats from the effects of climate change. This campaign combines fun, awareness, and action to make a tangible difference.

settings.title: The Why:
settings.copy: Penguins are suffering from the direct impacts of climate change, such as melting ice caps and rising sea levels, which threaten their natural habitat. By participating in this challenge, not only are you spreading awareness, but you‚Äôre also contributing to real-world solutions that help safeguard our planet and these charismatic creatures.

settings.copy: You create the ripple ‚Äì together, we make the wave!

settings.title: How to Participate:
settings.copy:
1. Record the Challenge: Use our specially designed AR filter to create a fun and engaging video. Emphasize how quick and easy it is to make a difference for penguins and the planet.
  2. Share and Tag: Upload your video using the hashtag #SaveThePenguins and tag @pudgypenguins. Make sure your post encourages others to join in.
  3. Pass It On: Nominate friends or influencers by tagging them in your post and challenge them to keep the momentum going.
